short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces every instance of 'Shark' with 'Shark (known for their smooth skin)'. I made this extension for a meme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces every instance of 'Shark' with 'Shark (known for their smooth skin)'. 
Case insensitive, works with plurals.
I made this extension for a meme. It has zero practical use.
